title: BBQ
text: My favorite summertime activity is grilling brats on my friend Phill's deck.

title: Beer
text: Favorite breweries include Dovetail, Spiteful, Hop Butcher, Pipeworks.

title: Coffee
text: I bought a Comandante in 2020 and it changed my entire coffee life!

title: Cooking
text: Food brings me so much happiness. I always swap recipes with friends.

title: Letters
text: I have a small typewriter collection and enjoy sending snail mail to pen pals.

title: Sketching
text: Art classes at the Lillstreet Art Center rock and am hyped to take a more!

title: Thrifting
text: The Village Discount is my favorite spot. Nearly all my clothes are thrifted.

title: Writing
text: I enjoy journaling, writing essays, memoir vignettes, and short stories.

title: Zines
text: I've been writing and publishing zines for well-over ten years.
